body_html: @gunan We currently need to run clean with each configure run to ensure that the @local_config_cuda repository is invalidated in case the configuration changes. IIUC, Bazel currently does not invalidate external repositories when environment variables change, but a future enhancement might be allowing repository rules to declare which environment variables it requires and invalidate if those variables are changed.

body: @gunan We currently need to run clean with each configure run to ensure that the `@local_config_cuda` repository is invalidated in case the configuration changes. IIUC, Bazel currently does not invalidate external repositories when environment variables change, but a future enhancement might be allowing repository rules to declare which environment variables it requires and invalidate if those variables are changed.
